SMART POOLs

Customizable AMM logic with Smart Pools

Smart Pools are dynamic liquidity pools with parameters that can be adjusted via smart contract code. Pool owners can specify who can join the pool. Innovate freely on Balancer’s open-source code.

New Balancer V2 Smart Pools are coming soon.

V1 Smart Pool docs

Via a Liquidity Bootstrapping Pool (LBP)

Investor clubs

Via a Swing Trading Pool

Launch a token

LBPs for a fair and liquid launch

A Liquidity Bootstrapping Pool is an adjustable Balancer Smart Pool designed for initial distribution and price discovery of new assets. Typically, the weight of assets in an LBP are programmed to continually change during the token sale.

Free & permissionless

Capital efficient

Fair distribution
